titles.title: LOSS Act of 202

To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the holders of approved applications for drugs to conduct a risk assessment to identify and evaluate risks to their supply chain and develop, maintain, and implement risk mitigation plans to address such risks, and for other purposes.
Limit Ongoing Shortages and Stabilize Supply Act of 2020
LOSS Act of 202

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Limit Ongoing Shortages and Stabilize Supply Act of 2020 or the LOSS Act of 2020
This bill addresses drug shortages, including by requiring drug manufacturers to conduct risk assessments and implement risk-mitigation plans with respect to such shortages.
